ADC Configuration

This is used as input for tounge sensors

#define USE_ADC
 Enable or not the ADC usage.
#define ADC_PRESCALER   64
 ADC Prescaler value.
#define ADC_RIGHT_ADJUST_RESULT   0
 Left adjust.
#define ADC_INTERNAL_VREF   1
 Use ADC internal Vref.
#define ADC_IT   0
 Disable ADC interrupt.
#define ADC_DIGITAL_OFF   1
 Turns off digital use of Port F (ADCs).

Mouse Configuration

Defines used in mouse_task.c

#define NB_IDLE_POLLING_SOF   3
 10ms before looking for new mouse hardware event
#define MOUSE_SPEED   1
#define DEBUG   0
 Set debug or normal mode.

Define Documentation

#define TARGET_BOARD   USBKEY

< Scheduler tasks declaration

To include proper target hardware definitions, select target board (USBKEY, STK525, STK600)
